§ 1861. Rules and regulations The Secretary may issue such rules and regulations as are necessary to carry out this chapter, consistent with the requirements of chapter 5 of title 5. (Pub. L. 97–470, title V, § 511, Jan. 14, 1983, 96 Stat. 2598.)
Statutory Notes and Related Subsidiaries Effective DateSection effective 90 days from Jan. 14, 1983, see section 524 of Pub. L. 97–470, set out as a note under section 1801 of this title.
